ai-ne12:1.1_0: Herein, what is the fuel for the stream?
ai-ne12:1.3_0: For one of right view, wrong view is worn away.
ai-ne12:1.4_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong view are worn away.
ai-ne12:1.5_0: And because of right view, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-ne12:1.6_0: For one of right thought, wrong thought is worn away.
ai-ne12:1.7_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong thought are worn away.
ai-ne12:1.8_0: And because of right thought, many skillful qualities produced by right thought.
ai-ne12:1.10_0: Right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge and vision of freedom.
ai-ne12:1.11_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong freedom are worn away.
ai-ne12:1.12_0: And because of right freedom, many skillful qualities are fully developed.
ai-ne12:2.1_0: or who has given up killing living creatures.
ai-ne12:2.3_0: They’ve given up the spiritual life.
ai-ne12:2.10_0: For one of right view, wrong view is given up.
ai-ne12:3.1_0: There are those who criticize the noble eightfold path in this very life, immediately effective, inviting inspection, relevant, so that sensible people can know it for themselves.
ai-ne12:3.2_0: If they have right view, they criticize the teaching.
ai-ne12:3.3_0: Their view of those who have wrong view and honor.
ai-ne12:3.4_0: right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
ai-ne12:3.5_0: Because of that wrong knowledge and vision of freedom, they praise and honor.
ai-ne12:4.1_0: Those who say this: “Sensual pleasures should be developed and cultivated. Sensual pleasures should be developed and cultivated. Sensual pleasures should be developed and cultivated.”
ai-ne12:4.2_0: Avoiding sensual pleasures is a bad principle.
ai-ne12:5.1_0: or, those who say: “Whose teaching is this?”
ai-ne12:5.2_0: It is the Dhamma that leads out,
ai-ne12:5.3_0: And those who say, “Suffering” is the principle that leads to suffering.
ai-ne12:5.5_0: Or they meditate observing an aspect of the perception of the ugliness in all processes.
ai-ne12:5.6_0: They meditate observing an aspect of pain, the perception of pleasure is given up.
ai-ne12:5.7_0: They meditate observing impermanence in impermanence.
ai-ne12:5.8_0: If they meditate observing not-self, the perception of non-self are given up.
ai-ne12:5.9_0: Whatever Dhamma they believe in a response or dropped into that teaching, they haven’t yet been reborn in him.
ai-ne12:5.10_0: Hence he said to Mahākaccāyana: “He is skilled in the teaching.”
